imdb.title: Shôjo kakumei Utena
imdb.plot: A tomboyish schoolgirl finds herself forced into repeated duels for another girl who has a role in a world revolution.

episodes.title: The Rose Bride
episodes.plot: In an attempt to defend her best friend's honor, Utena challenges the kendo captain to a duel, and soon finds herself wrapped up in so much more than she'd anticipated.

episodes.title: For Whom the Rose Smiles
episodes.plot: By chance, Utena managed to defeat Saionji in their duel, and now he's determined to have a rematch. However, Utena already secretly intends to lose on purpose.

episodes.title: On the Night of the Ball
episodes.plot: As Utena continues to adjust to life with her new roommate, she starts to realize how few friends Anthy actually has.

episodes.title: The Sunlit Garden: Prelude
episodes.plot: Miki, a shy pianist and member of the Student Council, has an interest in Anthy. Miki swears he has no interest in the duels and offers to help tutor Utena and Anthy.

episodes.title: The Sunlit Garden: Finale
episodes.plot: Miki's starting to realize the extent of Anthy's loyalty to her role as the Rose Bride. Will such an understanding be enough to move such a passive boy to duel for possession of her?

episodes.title: Nanami, Beware!
episodes.plot: A number of strange events have been occuring, placing Nanami in danger. The latest caused a dashing young boy to appear from out of nowhere to save her.

episodes.title: Juri's Unfulfillment
episodes.plot: Jury, the fencing team captain, has taken a special interest in Utena lately. She finds Utena's lack of regard for the dueling game to be sensible, but Jury still hopes to accomplish something by winning.

episodes.title: The Great Curry High Trip
episodes.plot: A mishap during home economics has caused Anthy and Utena to switch bodies. Nanami, accepting the blame for this mishap, sets out to find the cure for their predicament.

episodes.title: The Castle Said to Hold Eternity
episodes.plot: Saionji and Touga have always been at odds since they were children.

episodes.title: Nanami's Precious One
episodes.plot: Nanami's possessiveness of her brother has only grown after his injury at the hands of Saionji. Even the simplest gesure from Utena brings Nanami's jealousy and anger out...

episodes.title: Graceful and Ruthless: The One Who Picks the Flower
episodes.plot: Utena has gradually grown fonder of Touga over time. But even as she ponders as to whether or not Touga may be her prince, his plots continue to encircle her.

episodes.title: For Friendship, Perhaps
episodes.plot: After losing to Touga in their duel, Utena's spirit has been crushed.

episodes.title: Tracing a Path
episodes.plot: A look back at all the prior duels and major events with some perspective. Also, a hint of what lies in store for Utena if she continues the path of the duelist.

episodes.title: The Boys of the Black Rose
episodes.plot: Utena is introduced to Anthy's older brother, Akio, who also happens to be the acting chairman for the school. Meanwhile, trouble is brewing in the depths of Nemuro Memorial Hall.

episodes.title: The Landscape Framed by Kozue
episodes.plot: Kozue, Miki's twin sister, is seen as somewhat of an oddity around school. In particular, her feelings for her brother remain most ambiguous... but the Black Rose Society knows all.

episodes.title: Cowbell of Happiness
episodes.plot: Nanami's just received a priceless piece of jewelry; a Sebastian Dior... cow bell. As she touts it around school, people start to wonder if she's truly lost her mind.

episodes.title: Thorns of Death
episodes.plot: Shiori, Jury's childhood friend and the source of her heart's turmoil, has transferred to Ohtori Academy. As Jury tries her best to ignore Shiori, Mikage's seminar beckons to her.

episodes.title: Mitsuru's Growing Pains
episodes.plot: Mitsuru is constantly being excluded and disregarded due to his age. He yearns to be more like an adult, but isn't even sure what that entails.

episodes.title: The Song of the Fallen Kingdom
episodes.plot: When Wakaba was a child, she had a prince she'd held close in her heart. Well now, her prince has arrived at Ohtori, but he's interested in Utena! Will Utena be able to set him straight?

episodes.title: Wakaba Flourishing
episodes.plot: The expelled student council vice president, Saionji, has been shacking up with Wakaba. As she spends time with him, she starts to feel a change within herself.

episodes.title: Troublesome Insects
episodes.plot: Keiko's always been content with being a member of Nanami's gang, but her desires for Touga still remain. When an opportunity opens for her, it results in a disaster that Mikage can exploit.

episodes.title: Nemuro Memorial Hall
episodes.plot: The truth behind Nemuro Memorial Hall's dark history lies shrouded in mystery. As Mikage is down to his last black rose, he stakes his last hopes on allying with Utena.

episodes.title: Qualifications of a Duelist
episodes.plot: As the student council searches for answers as to who is behind the Black Rose Duelists, Utena is already poised to fight the mastermind of the plot.

episodes.title: The Secret Nanami Diary
episodes.plot: After a mishap puts Mitsuru in the hospital, Utena, Anthy, and Nanami stumble upon a diary he's kept that details Nanami's every plot since the time he's known her.

episodes.title: Their Eternal Apocalypse
episodes.plot: Saionji, still sore from the events surrounding his expulsion, vows to quit the dueling game. However, Touga and Akio have other plans for him.

episodes.title: Miki's Nest Box (The Sunlit Garden/Arranged)
episodes.plot: Miki, despite his friendship with Utena and Anthy, is once again pushed to duel. This time, his sister is the one doing the pushing.

episodes.title: Nanami's Egg
episodes.plot: Nanami is startled to find an egg in her bed one morning. Unsure as to whether or not it's possible that she's the mother, she assumes the role.

episodes.title: Whispering in the Dark
episodes.plot: After a long absence from school, Rukia, the original fencing captain, returns. But as to whether he's back to enjoy life as a student or to push Jury's buttons remains to be determined.

episodes.title: Azure Paler Than the Sky
episodes.plot: Realizing the only way to defeat Utena and Anthy is with a partnership equally as strong, Rukia seeks to ally himself with Jury.

episodes.title: The Barefoot Girl
episodes.plot: As Utena has gotten to know Akio, she's started to realize that she has feelings for him. But what of the prince Utena holds within her heart? And what of Akio's fiance? Can love be wrong?

episodes.title: Her Tragedy
episodes.plot: Nanami's growing irritation with the girls that flock to her brother is put into a strange context when she uncovers a horrifying revelation regarding their relationship.

episodes.title: The Romance of the Dancing Girls
episodes.plot: Unable to face Touga after uncovering the nature of their relationship, Nanami does all she can to avoid him.

episodes.title: The Prince Who Runs Through the Night
episodes.plot: Anthy sends Utena on an errand to deliver roses, but little does she realize that Anthy's plan is also Akio's plot.

episodes.title: The Rose Signet
episodes.plot: Utena, Anthy, and Akio all go to see a play being put on by the school's drama club. The play, however, rings a little closer to truth than it does to fairy-tale.

episodes.title: The Love That Blossomed in Wintertime
episodes.plot: Touga's carried out Akio's will without question, up until now.

episodes.title: And the Doors of Night Open
episodes.plot: Touga's resolved to duel with Utena one more time. Aware of his feelings for her, he concludes that the only way to save her is to defeat her before she meets her prince.

episodes.title: The One to Revolutionize the World
episodes.plot: Utena has uncovered the truth behind Anthy and Akio and her disgust for them both has brought her to forsake everything she's fought for up until now.

episodes.title: The Ends of the World
episodes.plot: Utena has decided to follow the letter's instructions and proceeds to the dueling arena to meet her prince.

episodes.title: Someday We Will Shine Together
episodes.plot: Utena's once again betrayed by Anthy. With the prince's sword in hand, Akio attempts to open the doors of revolution while the fallen prince contemplates her and Anthy's fate.
